name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
description:
Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce
  task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining
  connection.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.client.thread-count
description: The number of threads to handle client API requests

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.job.retry-interval
description:
The delay between getJob retries in ms for retries configured
  with yarn.app.mapreduce.client.job.max-retries.

name: dfs.mover.retry.max.attempts
description:
The maximum number of retries before the mover consider the
    move failed.

name: file.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write
